statements: UPDATE sustainable_building_materials SET cost_per_unit = 15.99, availability_status = TRUE WHERE material_id = 1;

UPDATE sustainable_building_materials SET cost_per_unit = 50.00, availability_status = TRUE WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainable_building_materials SET material_description = 'Eco-friendly material for sustainable construction' WHERE material_name = 'Green Concrete' AND material_type = 'Concrete';

UPDATE construction_projects SET project_location = 'New York' WHERE project_id = 3;

UPDATE building_materials SET material_type='Steel', sustainability_rating=5 WHERE material_id=1;
